title: Fixed appliances supplied by a flexible cord as installation wiring
fullText:
A flexible cord connected to an appliance or to equipment installed as installation wiring shall be â€”
(a) of the heavy-duty sheathed type; and
(b) where subject to mechanical damage, installed in a suitable wiring enclosure; and
(c) limited to a total length not exceeding 4.0 m; and
(d) with a minimum cross-sectional area of any conductor being not less than 1.5 mm2.
